Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 2.6Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible, 2048 MB video memory. E.g. GeForce GTX460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
